Walmart, whose inventory planning with artificial-intelligence software incorporates weather analysis, reduced sunscreen prices a couple weeks earlier than usual this year in parts of the U.S. Weather data forecasting a wetter-than-usual autumn in some U.S. regions was a factor in its decision, whereas several years ago, it likely would not have been, said Kirby Doyle, a skin-care category replenishment adviser to the world's biggest retailer."}, {"date": "20241104113219", "headline": "Amazon and Walmart introduce virtual and AI-powered shopping", "summary": "Customers can easily add products to the Virtual Holiday Shop cart and proceed to checkout with a few clicks."}, {"date": "20241104121800", "headline": "Kroger-Albertsons merger in court: 6 key takeaways", "summary": "Competition, pricing and the fate of Albertsons were key points of contention in the three court battles that unfolded over a nearly two-month period."}, {"date": "20241104134100", "headline": "Wayfair Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Down Y/Y", "summary": "W's third-quarter 2024 results reflect sluggishness across the United States region and lower net revenues per active customer."}, {"date": "20241104201727", "headline": "Funds Gobble Up Palantir Ahead Of Earnings;
